item.title: Categories and Tags in Blogs
item.description: TLDR Categories are broad topics that help you organize your blog posts, and help readers find the information they’re seeking on your site. Tags are a simple way to drill down on the topic of any given blog post that’s part of a category. Description These two words may be used interchangeably, but they are not the same thing. The difference is simple: A category is a broad topic you cover in your blog.
